text: Atonement is a 2007 British romantic drama war movie. It is set in the 1930s and 1940s. It was directed by Joe Wright. It is based on 2001 novel Atonement by Ian McEwan. It stars James McAvoy as Robbie Turner and Keira Knightley as Cecilia Tallis. Her younger sister Briony Tallis is played by Saoirse Ronan at age 13, Romola Garai at age 18 and Vanessa Redgrave at age 77. == Other websites == * Category:2000s mystery movies Category:2007 romantic drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:British war movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:2000s epic movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Joe Wright
title: Atonement (movie)
